Technical Support & Hot Topics (http://offers.tritech.com/TriTalk_2011_Q1_TechnicalSupportHotTopics)
VisiNet Solutions Tech Tips - Test Routability Using ESRI's MoNet Ever wonder why one unit was recommended over another? One way to diagnose a unit recommendation is to test routability of your street network. ESRI’s MoNet (Motion Network) is an application to test routing on a system without getting CAD involved. MoNet uses your base GIS files to test routability. It is a basic application that can be run on C: drive or thumb drive.

Featured Customers (http://offers.tritech.com/TriTalk_2011_Q1_CustomerFeature)
VisiNet Solutions Highlight - Harris County Emergency Corps Located in Houston, Texas, Harris County Emergency Corps Communication Center uses VisiCAD and VisiNet Mobile to provides services to 14 Fire and EMS agencies. VisiCAD and VisiNet Mobile replaced an aging DOS-based platform which was unable to scale with their continued growth. Read More...
Imc Solutions Highlight - Multiple Agencies The Auburn Police Department is one agency among many in the state of Maine that uses the Imc Cross Agency module to access real-time information from other participating law department databases. “Tracking criminals across multi-county crime sprees can be difficult,” said Deputy Chief Jason Moen of the Auburn Police Department. Read More...
EMS Highlight - Able EMS Able EMS, located in Wheelerburg, Ohio, was founded by a physician who recognized that the need for timely transportation of patients at the facility in which he worked was not being met. Consequently, he started the Able EMS in 2006 and the service has grown to 150 employees (as of 2010) working from seven different stations. The service covers six counties in Ohio, encompassing a population of around 1.9 million people. Read More...
